judgment_text:
-1-
 IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
 ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION
 Court Receiver s Report No.51 of 2007
 In
 Suit No.771 of 1976
 I.C.D.I. Ltd. .. .. Plaintiff
 v/s.
 Khanderao R. Shivalkar & ors. .. .. Defendants
 Mr.D.B. Sawant for Defendants.
 Mr.D.V.Deokar, 1st Asstt. to C.R.
 ----
 CORAM : SMT.R.S. DALVI, J. 
CORAM : SMT.R.S. DALVI, J. 
CORAM : SMT.R.S. DALVI, J. 
 DATED : 23rd March, 2007
DATED : 23rd March, 2007
DATED : 23rd March, 2007
 P.C. :
P.C. :
P.C. :
 1. There are certain unauthorised structures on the suit premises.
 Respondent Nos.2 to 25 have been directed to pay the balance
 decretal amount of Rs.6,04,763/- and the security charges of
 Rs.7,73,574.37. The Respondents shall show a Receipt evidencing
 such payments. Upon the Receipt being shown to the Court
 Receiver, the Court Receiver shall inform the officers of the
 Bombay Municipal Corporation to remove the unauthorised structures
 from the suit premises. Upon the unauthorised structures being
 removed, the Court Receiver shall hand over possession of the suit
 plot No.169 to Respondent Nos.2 to 25.
 2. The unauthorised structures from plot No.159 are removed. The
 Court Receiver shall hand over possession of plot No.159 to
 Respondent Nos.2 to 25. Upon handing over such possession, the
 Court Receiver shall stand discharged without passing accounts and
 -2-
 upon payment of his costs, charges and expenses.
 3. The Court Receiver Report is disposed of accordingly.
 (Smt.R.S. Dalvi, J.)
(Smt.R.S. Dalvi, J.)
(Smt.R.S. Dalvi, J.)
